#include <iostream>
#include <sstream>
#include <fstream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <deque>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 10007
#define N 10000001
int a[N];
int b[N];
int cal(int n)
{
	int re=1,t=2;
	while(n)
	{
		if(n&1)
			re=re*t%MOD;
		t=t*t%MOD;
		n/=2;
	}
	return re;
}
int main(void){
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int i,n;
	long long j;
	for(i=2;i<N;i++)
		a[i]=1;
	for(i=2;i<N;i++)
		if(a[i])
			for(j=(long long)i*i;j<N;j+=i)
				a[j]=0;
	for(i=2;i<N;i++)
		b[i]=b[i-1]+a[i];
	while(cin>>n)
	{
		if(n==1)
			cout<<0<<'\n';
		else
			cout<<cal(b[n]-1)<<'\n';
	}
	////system("pause");
	return 0;
}
